channel.title: HB 1148 - Exempting goods and services provided by youth athletic facilities from sales and use tax.

item.title: First reading, referred to Finance (Not Officially read and referred until adoption of Introduction report).

item.title: 👍Avik Choudhury - WA Assoc Sheriffs & Police Chiefs
item.description: Avik Choudhury signed up to testify Pro.

item.description: Fiona Nelson signed up to testify Pro.

item.description: Phil Champlin signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent HUB Sports Center.

item.description: Kate Armstrong signed up to testify Other.

item.description: Nadine Burgess signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Spokane Gymnastics.

item.description: Jake Mayson signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent Greater Spokane Incorporated. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Jared Tikker signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent The Warehouse Athletic Facility.
